name: J3FF's Quest
description:
This is J3FF. Just a little robot looking for a good time and maybe, along the way, a purpose in life

A game by the fabulous Scaffold 11 Team.  A learning experience for everyone, we're really proud of what we were able to do in this short amount of time.

The Team:

  • Alex (Game Designer)
  • Isaac (Audio Designer)
  • Lisa (Producer)
  • Uyi (Artist)
  • Michael (Programmer)
  • David(Programmer)
  • Tony(Artist/Team Lead)
Also, credit to OllieBerz for his Industrial Texture Pack
